textAfterTable: there are no dorms on campus. Academic Rigor athens technical college is thorough with the material you learn. i love that they are firm believers in learning through hands-on experience as well as standard read and write methods Tips for prospective students humility is what you need to see the gold when you check out athens technical college. the fact of the matter is that athens technical does not have all the fancy bells and whistles that a traditional college shoots to advertise to you to get you to attend. what athens technical college has is the priceless experienced instructors that have been where you want to go and can give you awesome advise. you are the one that has to make an effort, like you should out of humility, to ask them what you would like to find out. In three sentences i love athens technical college because of the individual attention that i receive from all of the instructors. the instructors consistently make an effort to help you understand what you are dealing with and how you will come across a certain situation in the particular field that you are studying. the best part of it all is that they are constantly updating job posts in the local area for you to apply for.
